description.en: Retrieve the current Sui system state including validator information and network parameters.

output.SYSTEM_TYPE: transform:() => { const data = results.SYSTEM_STATE; return data?.data?.type || data?.type || 'Unknown'; }
output.SYSTEM_VERSION: transform:() => { const data = results.SYSTEM_STATE; const fields = data?.data?.content?.fields || data?.content?.fields || {}; return fields.version || '0'; }
